description: Bringing Kate Zessel’s art to their Merino Sport 150 fabric, they've created a shirt that’s as practical as it is stylish. As a short-sleeved baselayer, this men’s shirt will help with odor control and body temperature management. Plus, it offers UPF 20+ for protection from the sun’s rays. With its cutting-edge buffalo design, this shirt will make you the talk of the town.
name: Smartwool Merino Sport 150 By The Horns Graphic Tee - Mens
